title: EMF Protect & Balance
description: EMF Protect & Balance by DesBio is formulated to counter the influence of geopathic energy on the polarity of the body.
cleaned_text: $ 26.95 $ 0.00 EMF Protect & Balance EMF Protect and Balance from DesBio is a homeopathic product that supports the temporary relief of symptoms related to geopathic stress including, jet lag, polarity change, general bodily aches, nervousness, muscle cramps, sleep dysfunction, stress and fatigue. Active Ingredients Alfalfa (3X) 25% ethanol. 1 fluid ounce.
